text: TODAY @ 4:30 p.m. on @ABC7Chicago: 61-year-old Dave is an #Illinois champion of #motocross racing. Learn how the #sport helped save Dave’s life, and why it was so important for him to put the @NorthwesternMed logo on his bike. @JHendersonABC7 will share the story. #cancer https://t.co/Feabk1QXsT
